question: What are innopoints?
answer: Innopoints are a reward system for students engaging in extracurricular activities. They can be exchanged for merch, canteen services, and dorm accommodation.
generated_answer: Innopoints are a type of reward system for students who actively participate in extracurricular activities. They can be earned by volunteering, managing student clubs, and other similar activities. Innopoints can be exchanged for branded merchandise, canteen services, and accommodation in IU dorms.

question: I volunteered at some event, how quickly will I get innopoints for that?
answer: Innopoints for volunteering requests will be credited to your account within 14 calendar days.
generated_answer: Innopoints will be credited to your account no later than 14 calendar days after making a request.

question: How to create a student club?
answer: Create a student club by visiting campuslife.innopolis.ru/clubs and clicking on 'Create my Club.' Contact [@VOSpiridonova](http://t.me/VOSpiridonova) for inquiries.
generated_answer: To create a student club, you can visit the website campuslife.innopolis.ru/clubs and click on the "Create my Club" button. For any questions or assistance, you can contact @VOSpiridonova.

question: How does the University support student clubs?
answer: Student clubs can apply for resources, promotion support, and participate in the Club League for points. Top clubs receive budgets for purchases, claim Higher Scholarships, and earn innopoints. Contact [@VOSpiridonova](http://t.me/VOSpiridonova) for queries and suggestions.
generated_answer: The University supports student clubs by providing resource provision such as audience and basic inventory/equipment, as well as promotion support. Additionally, student clubs have the opportunity to participate in the Club League, where they can earn points for various criteria. At the end of every semester, the top 20 clubs receive a budget that they can use for relevant purchases or services. Club leaders of the top 20 clubs can also claim points for a Higher Scholarship every semester and innopoints at the end of the academic year. For further questions and suggestions, individuals can contact @VOSpiridonova.

question: Can I create an event at Innopolis University?
answer: Yes, form a team, plan the event stages, and fill the form on campuslife.innopolis.ru/events. Afterward, visit the 319 office.
generated_answer: Yes, you can create an event at Innopolis University. To do this, you need to form a team, plan all organization stages, and fill out the form on the campuslife.innopolis.ru/events website. After filling out the form, please visit the 319 office.

question: How can I volunteer and get innopoints?
answer: Explore volunteering opportunities on ipts.innopolis.university using your inno email. Create your project, confirm it with [@VOSpiridonova](http://t.me/VOSpiridonova), and after closing the event on the website, you'll earn innopoints.
